description: Gold standard dataset for SNP/indel variants only (POC scope)

entries.notes: FDA-approved BRAF inhibitors (vemurafenib, dabrafenib, encorafenib) with strong clinical evidence
references: Chapman PB et al. N Engl J Med 2011

entries.notes: FDA-approved EGFR TKIs (erlotinib, gefitinib, afatinib, osimertinib)
references: Rosell R et al. Lancet Oncol 2012
Skoulidis F et al. N Engl J Med 2021
Demetri GD et al. N Engl J Med 2002

entries.notes: BRAF inhibitors show activity but are not first-line; combination therapy recommended
references: Kopetz S et al. N Engl J Med 2019

entries.notes: Alpelisib approved for PIK3CA-mutant, HR+/HER2- breast cancer
references: Andre F et al. N Engl J Med 2019

entries.notes: No approved targeted therapies; MEK inhibitors show some activity in trials
references: Ascierto PA et al. Lancet Oncol 2013

entries.notes: No approved targeted therapies; prognostic but not predictive
references: Olivier M et al. Cold Spring Harb Perspect Biol 2010
Moore K et al. N Engl J Med 2018
DiNardo CD et al. N Engl J Med 2018
